title: Exclusive Course Opportunity
dc:creator: Tyler Folkman
content:encoded:
Hey there,

Sorry that things have been silent from me for a while! But, don’t worry, I’ve been thinking a lot about how I can help you become a better data scientist.

As many of you know, I recently sent out a survey to better understand what people would love to learn. The top 3 results by far were:

  1. Deployment of machine learning models

  2. Getting a data science job or promotion

  3. Translating a business problem to a data science problem

So - I decided to create a course that addresses all three!

The course is called Delivering Real Business Value with Machine Learning and teaches you how to:

  • Move beyond machine learning hype to actual value creation

  • Learn how to deploy your own models without having to rely on an engineer

  • Gain skills that will truly stand out when looking for your next job or promotion

  • Improve your ability to communicate with leaders at your company

I've seen an insane increase in data science value once data scientists learn these skills because they can own the process end-to-end and iterate rapidly.

I am looking for a small group of people to be part of a limited beta group as I build the course and wanted to give you an opportunity to join! Currently, I only have 5 spots remaining in the beta.

Those in the beta will get access to the course content as I create it and will have an opportunity to provide me feedback as we go so I can tailor it to be as useful as possible to you. I'm committed to taking whatever time necessary to help ensure people in the beta get an amazing return.

Also, as part of the beta, you will be receiving $500 off.

If you want to grab one of the last spots, go purchase the beta course here:

Purchase Beta Course

This page also has some more information for you regarding the course, including a detailed syllabus.

If I can answer any other questions for you, please reach out at tyler@learningwithdata.com.

I’m incredibly excited to start creating this course and helping data scientists create real value.

Keep learning,

Tyler
